description: Forms new string from left and right strings. It is optional to put a seperator inbetween.
label: Concat String

options.name: left
options.label: Left
options.info: The left part of the string.

options.name: separator
options.label: Separator
options.info: Optional separator between left and right part.

options.name: right
options.label: Right
options.info: The right part of the string.

options.name: result
options.label: As
options.info: The name of the variable that holds the concatenated string.
